question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Diabetes Day (WDD)?
option2: Women and diabetes: Our right to a healthy future
option3: Women and diabetes: Right to health
answer: Women and diabetes: Our right to a healthy future
explanation: The World Diabetes Day (WDD) is observed on November 14 to promote better diabetes management among people across the globe who are or have been suffering from the condition, which is initiated by International Diabetes Federation (IDF). The 2017 theme is "Women and diabetes - our right to a healthy future".
